function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased job changes among immigrants","Impact":"Social disruption, potential spread of contagious diseases through increased contact","Mitigation":"Implement flexible work policies to reduce contact, increase vaccination rates among immigrants","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, vaccination tracking and management systems","People":"Immigrants, general population","Owner":"Employers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Simultaneous increase in immigrant unemployment in multiple countries","Impact":"Economic strain, mental health issues, potential increase in risky behavior","Mitigation":"Provide economic support, mental health resources, and job retraining programs for unemployed immigrants","Technologies":"Economic support systems, mental health platforms, online job training programs","People":"Unemployed immigrants, local communities","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations, employers"},{"Description":"Higher participation rate of immigrants post-pandemic","Impact":"Potential increase in contact and interaction, higher risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Promote health and safety guidelines, increase access to healthcare for immigrants","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, telehealth services, multilingual health resources","People":"Immigrants, local communities","Owner":"Public health authorities, community organizations"}]}
